detectors.description:
Diamond (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/polygon/contracts/mumbai/sorted/0.8.4/b2AF0F6539AA0a025f40b28CDbE467F730F1A430_MutualOwnership.sol/b2AF0F6539AA0a025f40b28CDbE467F730F1A430_MutualOwnership.sol#104-152) is an upgradeable proxy.
facet is declared in the proxy.
selectorToFacetAndPosition maps function signatures to addresses, suggesting multiple implementations.
selectorToFacetAndPosition is stored in the structure specified by EIP-2535: LibDiamond.DiamondStorage
Loupe functions located in missing
Found compatibility checks in all upgrade functions.
To remove upgradeability, delete the LibDiamond facet

Diamond.constructor(address,address).check: require(bool,string)(oldFacetAddress != _facetAddress,LibDiamondCut: Can't replace function with same function)

LibDiamond.diamondCut(IDiamondCut.FacetC.check: require(bool,string)(oldFacetAddress != _facetAddress,LibDiamondCut: Can't replace function with same function)
